Container.Description:
Wiki.js | A modern and powerful wiki app built on Node.js
Template for the official docker container.
For the full documentation, see: https://docs.requarks.io/install/docker

Config.Name: Database Type
Database Host
Config.Description: Hostname or IP of the database</br> Not required for sqlite

Config.Name: Database Port
Config.Description: Port of the database</br> Not required for sqlite

Config.Name: Database User
Config.Description: Username to connect to the database</br> Not required for sqlite

Config.Name: Database Password
Config.Description: Password to connect to the database</br> Not required for sqlite

Config.Name: Database Name
Config.Description: Database name</br> Not required for sqlite

Config.Name: Appdata path
Config.Description: Where to store the sqlite database</br> Only required when using sqlite
